pageIntro: Short, beginner-friendly lessons on blockchain and the Stellar network. No prior knowledge required.

import.title: Import progress
import.summary: Summary: {lessons} lessons, {stars} total stars. Practice Metadata: {meta}

lesson1.title: What is a blockchain?
lesson1.learningOutcome: A blockchain is an immutable digital ledger that everyone can jointly verify.

lesson2.title: Understand Stellar
lesson2.task: Send token to friend (simulation) and see speed
lesson2.learningOutcome: Stellar is fast, inexpensive, and mining-free.

lesson3.title: Public & Privacy
lesson3.task: View the public transaction and guess if you know who is sending it.
lesson3.learningOutcome: Everything is visible, but no one knows the true name.

lesson4.title: Your account
lesson4.goal: Understand the structure and significance of public/private keys
lesson4.task: Matching Game: What is Public, What is Secret
lesson4.learningOutcome: Only the secret key provides access; the public key can be shared.

lesson5.title: Send & Receive
lesson5.goal: Understanding the Functionality of Transactions and Trustlines
lesson5.task: Execute test transmission and view fee.
lesson5.learningOutcome: Each transaction incurs a small fee; trustline = permission to receive.

lesson6.title: Token & Trading
lesson6.task: Place token on virtual marketplace and observe price changes.
lesson6.learningOutcome: Price is determined by supply and demand.

lesson7.title: Security
lesson7.task: Sorting correct/incorrect actions; Identifying fake tokens
lesson7.learningOutcome: Secrecy of the key, secure storage, and using a testnet.

lesson8.title: Verification & Identity
lesson8.learningOutcome: KYC = Identity check, verification shows trusted tokens.

lesson9.title: Zero Knowledge
lesson9.task: Example scenario: 'I am over 18' without displaying a birth date.
lesson9.learningOutcome: It is possible to prove something without revealing secrets.

lesson10.title: Practice with SKM
lesson10.task: Create account in the testnet, activate it, set trustline, send token
lesson10.learningOutcome: Understand the technical processes of a transaction.

lesson11.title: Responsibility
lesson11.task: Decision Game: Act Correctly or Not?
lesson11.learningOutcome: Blockchain is final; diligence is a duty.

lesson12.title: Conclusion / Playful Learning
lesson12.learningOutcome: Review learned material, recognize personal progress.
